I am a Data Science undergraduate at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. My specialization is in building robust **Data Pipelines**, applying **Statistical Modeling**, and developing **Artificial Intelligence** solutions to solve real-world problems.

Outside of school, I love exercising and binge-watching dramas.
